actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor

official_title: A bill to amend the Black Lung Benefits Act of 1969 to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Black Lung Benefits Act of 1969 to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act with respect to black lung claims filed after December 31, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Black Lung Benefits Act of 1969 to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act.
